trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when recursive entry into a lock is not compatible with the recursion policy for the lock.
trans-unit.target: 当进入锁定状态的递归与此锁定的递归策略不兼容时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.LockRecursionException> is thrown for several reasons, including the following:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.LockRecursionException> 引发的原因，其中包括：

trans-unit.source: If a thread tries to enter an instance of <xref:System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim> recursively, but the instance does not support recursion.
trans-unit.target: 如果线程尝试输入的实例<xref:System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim>以递归方式，但此实例不支持递归。

trans-unit.source: If a thread tries to enter a <xref:System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim> instance in write mode or upgradeable mode when the thread initially entered the lock in read mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果线程尝试输入<xref:System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim>中写入模式或进入可升级模式时线程最初进入读取模式锁定的实例。

trans-unit.source: This represents a potential deadlock and therefore is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示潜在死锁，因此不允许。

trans-unit.source: If allowing one more level of recursion would exceed the maximum value for the internal storage counter used to track recursions.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许添加一个级别的递归方式将超过用于跟踪递归的内部存储计数器的最大值。

trans-unit.source: This limit is so large that applications should never encounter it.
trans-unit.target: 此限制数值很大，因此任何情况下应用程序都不应遇到此情况。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows two causes of <xref:System.Threading.LockRecursionException> when using the <xref:System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示两个原因<xref:System.Threading.LockRecursionException>时使用<xref:System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim>类。

trans-unit.source: The program creates a <xref:System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim> by using the default constructor, which disallows recursion.
trans-unit.target: 程序创建<xref:System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim>通过使用默认构造函数，它不允许使用递归。

trans-unit.source: The program then starts a thread that enters the lock in read mode.
trans-unit.target: 然后，程序将启动进入读取模式锁定的线程。

trans-unit.source: The thread tries to enter the lock recursively in read mode, and catches the resulting exception.
trans-unit.target: 线程尝试锁定以递归方式进入读取模式，并在捕获产生的异常。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the thread tries to enter write mode, which would create a potential for deadlocks.
trans-unit.target: 最后，该线程尝试进入写入模式，可能会造成死锁。

trans-unit.source: The thread catches the resulting exception.
trans-unit.target: 线程捕获产生的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockRecursionException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockRecursionException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockRecursionException" /> class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 使用由系统提供的用于描述错误的消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockRecursionException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Recursive read lock acquisitions not allowed in this mode."
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>为系统提供的消息的描述错误，如"递归读取锁获取在此模式下不允许。"的新实例的属性

trans-unit.source: This message takes the current system culture into account.
trans-unit.target: 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 本地化的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述该异常的消息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor must make sure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方必须确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockRecursionException" /> class with a specified message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的描述错误的消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockRecursionException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the new exception with the `message` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性的新异常`message`参数。

trans-unit.source: The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: `message` 的内容被设计为人可理解的形式。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor must make sure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方必须确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.LockRecursionException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Threading.LockRecursionException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 关于来源和目标的上下文信息

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockRecursionException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 用序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockRecursionException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute an exception object that is transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象过程中调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述该异常的消息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor must make sure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方必须确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The exception that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 引发当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 参数不为 <see langword="null" />，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockRecursionException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockRecursionException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.LockRecursionException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Threading.LockRecursionException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
The exception specified in `innerException`.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的异常`innerException`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string specified in `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message` 中指定的错误消息字符串。
